amendment.description: Amendment adds alternative credit scoring as an element of the Annual Housing Report Regarding Regulated Entities required by the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 109-254 to add "alternative credit scoring" as an additional element to the Annual Housing Report Regarding Regulated Entities (Section 1324).

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Sanchez, Loretta.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
